maxDiceCount.name: Maximum dice thrown:
maxDiceCount.hint: The largest number of dice you can throw with Simple Dice Roller. Min: 1. Max: 30. Default: 7.

enableFirstColumn.name: Enable extra column for rolling 1 die
enableFirstColumn.hint: Note that the dice-icon column is always clickable similar to other online tabletop platfroms.

enableD2.name: Enable D2 dice rolls
enableD2.hint: If you want to see D2 dice rolls.

enableD100.name: Enable D100 dice rolls
enableD100.hint: If you want to see 100 dice rolls.

enableFudgeDice.name: Enable 'Fudge Dice'
enableFudgeDice.hint: For rolling 'Fudge Dice' (a.k.a. 'Fate Dice') for your Fate and Fudge games.
